data.eml:eml: A taxonomic revision of the southern African species of the subgenus Creightonella Cockerell (Apoidea: Megachilidae: Megachile Latreille)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Eardley, Connal (2012): A taxonomic revision of the southern African species of the subgenus Creightonella Cockerell (Apoidea: Megachilidae: Megachile Latreille). Zootaxa 3159: 1-35, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.246125
